collectionProcessors.description: removes empty records in this collection
collectionProcessors.name: Finalize_User_Notification_List_Leadership
collectionProcessors.label: Finalize User Notification List - Leadership

collectionProcessors.description: removes empty records in this collection
collectionProcessors.name: Finalize_User_Notification_List_Rep
collectionProcessors.label: Finalize User Notification List - Rep

decisions.description: If no Opp on Case, add Requester's Manager as recipient since no Opp = no Opp Owner = no Opp Owner Manager
decisions.name: Opp_on_Case
decisions.label: Opp on Case?

Flow.description: Copied from v14 Sales Weight Date modifier removed from formulas that calculate Case Priority. I.e. this can once again update Case Priority, but Sales Weight Date will no longer impact the Priority value set.

formulas.name: EmailBody
formulas.expression: "Case Number: " & {!recordId.CaseNumber} & BR() & "Case Subject: " & {!recordId.Subject} & BR() & "Case Contact: " & {!recordId.Contact.FirstName} & " " & {!recordId.Contact.LastName} & BR() & "Case Account: " & {!recordId.Account.Name} & BR() & "Case Opportunity: " & {!recordId.Opportunity__r.Name} & BR() & "Sales Weight Approval Status: " & {!SalesWeightApproval} & BR() & IF( !ISBLANK( {!SalesWeightValue} ), "Sales Weight: " & {!SalesWeightValue} ,"") & BR() & {!RecordLink}

formulas.name: NotificationBody
formulas.expression: "Case Number: " & {!recordId.CaseNumber} & BR() & "Case Subject: " & {!recordId.Subject} & BR() & "Case Contact: " & {!recordId.Contact.FirstName} & " " & {!recordId.Contact.LastName} & BR() & "Case Account: " & {!recordId.Account.Name} & BR() & "Case Opportunity: " & {!recordId.Opportunity__r.Name} & BR() & "Sales Weight Approval Status: " & {!SalesWeightApproval} & BR() & IF( !ISBLANK( {!SalesWeightValue} ), "Sales Weight: " & {!SalesWeightValue} ,"")

formulas.description: Only grabs the Opp Owner Id if different than current user
formulas.name: OppOwnerIdSmart

formulas.description: Copied from v14 Sales Weight Date modifier removed from formula
formulas.name: PriorityCalculatorLeadershipApprove

formulas.description: Copied from v14 Sales Weight Date modifier removed from formula
formulas.name: PriorityCalculatorLeadershipSetOpt

formulas.description: Copied from v14 Sales Weight Date modifier removed from formula
formulas.name: PriorityCalculatorLeadershipSetReq

formulas.description: If Sales Weight Date is <= _ days, the Sales Weight calculation will increase the Sales Weight Value
formulas.name: PriorityDateWindow

formulas.description: Setting Sales Weight from Approval path, where values are in the record already
formulas.name: SalesWeight_Approve
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!recordId.Sales_Weight_Reason__c},"PO is in Hand"), 3, IF(ISPICKVAL({!recordId.Sales_Weight_Reason__c},"PO is Pending Quote"), 2, 1) )

formulas.description: Setting Sales Weight from Leadership path, where values are in screen flow inputs
formulas.name: SalesWeight_Set_Leadership_Opt
formulas.expression: IF({!Sales_Weight_Reason_Leadership_Input} = "PO is in Hand", 3, IF({!Sales_Weight_Reason_Leadership_Input} = "PO is Pending Quote", 2, 1) )

formulas.description: Setting Sales Weight from Leadership path, where values are in screen flow inputs
formulas.name: SalesWeight_Set_Leadership_Req
formulas.expression: IF({!Sales_Weight_Reason_Leadership_Input} = "PO is in Hand", 3, IF({!Sales_Weight_Reason_Leadership_Input} = "PO is Pending Quote", 2, 1) )

Flow.label: Sales Weight

recordLookups.description: Gets the SalesWeight_Case custom notification ID for later
recordLookups.name: CustomNotificationId
recordLookups.label: CustomNotificationId

recordLookups.name: Get_Requester_Leadership
recordLookups.label: Get Requester - Leadership

fields.name: Path
fields.fieldText: Hello, Admin! Which path would you like to take?

fields.name: SalesWeightInputDescription_Rep
fields.fieldText: Please provide the following inputs to request Sales Weight for this Case.

screens.name: Reset_Sales_Weight_Request_Leadership
screens.label: Reset Sales Weight Request

fields.name: ResetDescription_Leadership
fields.fieldText:
This Case has already had Sales Weight Requested.


Here is the current status of that request:


Sales Weight Reason: {!recordId.Sales_Weight_Reason__c}

Sales Weight Date (if applicable): {!recordId.Sales_Weight_Date__c}

Sales Weight Approval Status: {!recordId.Sales_Weight_Approval__c}

Sales Weight (blank, or 1-3): {!recordId.Sales_Weight__c}

Last Requested: {!recordId.Sales_Weight_Last_Request_Date__c} by {!recordId.Sales_Weight_Last_Requested_By__c}


By proceeding, you will be removing this request and starting over.

screens.nextOrFinishButtonLabel: Remove Previous Sales Weight and Continue

screens.name: Reset_Sales_Weight_Request_Rep
screens.label: Reset Sales Weight Request

fields.name: ResetDescription_Rep
fields.fieldText:
This Case has already had Sales Weight Requested.


Here is the current status of that request:


Sales Weight Reason: {!recordId.Sales_Weight_Reason__c}

Sales Weight Date (if applicable): {!recordId.Sales_Weight_Date__c}

Sales Weight Approval Status: {!recordId.Sales_Weight_Approval__c}

Sales Weight (blank, or 1-3): {!recordId.Sales_Weight__c}

Last Requested: {!recordId.Sales_Weight_Last_Request_Date__c} by {!recordId.Sales_Weight_Last_Requested_By__c}


By proceeding, you will be removing this request and starting over.

screens.nextOrFinishButtonLabel: Remove Previous Sales Weight and Continue

fields.name: Sales_Weight_Approval_Leadership_Description
fields.fieldText:
This Case is awaiting Sales Weight Approval.


Here is the current status of that request:


Sales Weight Reason: {!recordId.Sales_Weight_Reason__c}

Sales Weight Date (if applicable): {!recordId.Sales_Weight_Date__c}

Sales Weight Approval Status: {!recordId.Sales_Weight_Approval__c}

Last Requested: {!recordId.Sales_Weight_Last_Request_Date__c} by {!recordId.Sales_Weight_Last_Requested_By__c}

fields.name: Approval_Decision_Leadership
fields.fieldText: Do you approve this Case receiving Sales Weight?

fields.name: SalesWeightInputDescription_Leadership
fields.fieldText: As Leadership, you are setting the following values. The Sales Weight will be per the calculation and marked as Approved.

fields.name: UnavailableNotice
fields.fieldText: Based on your profile, you do not have access to Sales Weight.
